sentence.Network_en: Nowadays, a great deal can be done to alleviate back pain.
sentence.Network_cn: 如今，减轻背部疼痛可以有许多方法。

sentence.Network_en: Tranquillizers help alleviate the distressing symptoms of anxiety.
sentence.Network_cn: 镇静剂有助于缓解焦虑所带来的不安症状。

sentence.Network_en: A number of measures were taken to alleviate the problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 采取了一系列措施缓解这个问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from late Latin alleviat- 'lightened', from the verb alleviare, from Latin allevare, from ad- 'to' + levare 'raise', influenced by levis 'light'

entry.def: If you alleviate pain, suffering, or an unpleasant condition, you make it less intense or severe.

example.ex: Nowadays, a great deal can be done to alleviate back pain.
example.tran: 如今，减轻背部疼痛可以有许多方法。

means.word_mean: 1. provide physical relief, as from pain;

sentences.sentence: "you could facilitate the process by sharing your knowledge"

auth_sentence.content: Have you tried acupuncture to help alleviate the pain?
auth_sentence.res_content: Have you tried acupuncture to help alleviate the pain?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Have you tried acupuncture to help alleviate the pain?

auth_sentence.content: She was simply doing what she could to alleviate suffering.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was simply doing what she could to alleviate suffering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was simply doing what she could to alleviate suffering.

auth_sentence.content: There were other ways to alleviate the burdens of slavery.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were other ways to alleviate the burdens of slavery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were other ways to alleviate the burdens of slavery.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不相干的,离题的,与……不相干
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+relevant[adj.有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的]→adj.不相干的,离题的,与……不相干

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+lev举起,变轻+ant……的→再举起→有关的
elevate[v.举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位]+or器→n.电梯,升降机
lev举起,变轻+er表名词→举起[重东西]的东西
lever[n.杆,杠杆,手段,途径,工具]+age状态→n.杠杆作用
lev举起,变轻+ity表名词→n.轻率,轻浮
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax
al一再+lev举起,变轻+iate表动词→不断轻→减轻

stems_affixes.value_cn: 举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+lev举起,变轻+ate表动词→举出→升高
lev举起,变轻+it+ate表动词→使东西举起→升到空中
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax

Sentence.sentence: But some of the consequences can be alleviated.

means.word_mean: (在痛苦方面)减轻, 缓解, 缓和

sentences.en: The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain.
sentences.cn: 医生给她注射以减轻疼痛。

jushi.english: This money should alleviate our financial problems.
jushi.chinese: 这笔钱应该能缓和我们的财政问题。

jushi.english: A number of measures were taken to alleviate the problem.
jushi.chinese: 采取了一系列措施缓解这个问题。

jushi.english: The drug will alleviate her suffering.
jushi.chinese: 这药可以减轻她的痛苦。
